name: Magnite
description:
Farm,  craft, and explore your way through a procedurally generated world. 

The world is yours! Whether you want to create a massive farm or simply explore around. This is an early demo of the open-world farming simulator developed by ScriptLine Studios

Features:

  • A large procedurally generated world to explore
  • A crafting system
  • A save/load system so you don't lose your world's progress!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • Q - Build Mode
  • E - Crafting

NOTE: This game is still in very early development. The purpose of this demo is to gauge how large the audience for a game like this would be and also get some ideas/ feedback from the community. The game is free, if you don't want to donate click the "no thanks take me to downloads button" :)
